mapper.select: select e.*,ex.examname,u.sname,m.mname from examresult e INNER JOIN exam ex on e.examid=ex.id INNER JOIN userstu u on e.stuid=u.id INNER JOIN major m on e.mid = m.id where examname like #{ex} LIMIT #{index},10
select count(e.id) from examresult e INNER JOIN exam ex on e.examid=ex.id INNER JOIN userstu u on e.stuid=u.id INNER JOIN major m on e.mid = m.id where examname like #{ex}
mapper.insert: INSERT into examresult(examid,compresult,paperesult,stuid,mid) VALUES(#{examid},#{compresult},#{paperesult}, (select id from userstu where sname =#{sname}),#{mid})
